attributes.action: Change the law on dog attacks in the home.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All dogs that attack and bite without provocation should be destroyed as they are then capable of re-offending and attacking others. All owners with a dog should advertise what breed they have in their home.
I was bitten in the face unprovoked by a dog who i have known for 4 years, i was hospitalised for 2 days and went to theatre to have 25 stitches. I have been left physicaly and mentally scarred. I feel this law should be changed for the safety of other people.
I am disgusted that being bitten in the dogs home is not an offence as I was assulted. 
Licenses should be issued to all dog owners no matter what breed they hold, each dog will have a identity number which can be logged into police files following incidents.
Please sign my petition to stop others going through what i have encountered.
